scripts.dev: npm run clean && NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev  -p 3004 --experimental-https
scripts.build: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production next build
scripts.start: npm run clean && next build && next start

scripts-unused.update: UPDATES=$(npm outdated | awk 'NR>1 {print $1"@"$3}' || true); if [ -n "$UPDATES" ]; then echo "Updating the following packages: $UPDATES"; echo "$UPDATES" | xargs npm install --force --save 2>/dev/null || true; echo "✅ Successfully updated: $UPDATES"; else echo "✅ No dependency updates needed."; fi; npm audit fix 2>/dev/null || true
scripts-unused.update-all: npm run update && UPDATES=$(npm outdated --dev | awk 'NR>1 {print $1"@"$3}') && [ -n "$UPDATES" ] && echo "$UPDATES" | xargs npm install --force --save-dev; UPDATES=$(npm outdated --optional | awk 'NR>1 {print $1"@"$3}') && [ -n "$UPDATES" ] && echo "$UPDATES" | xargs npm install --force --save-optional; npm audit fix
